class.name: BaseDriver
class.documentation: These parameters are common to all the output drivers and can be used whichever output format is selected.

parameter.name: output_title
parameter.documentation: Defines a title for the output which gets displayed if the format supports it.

parameter.name: output_name
parameter.documentation: Defines the root of output filename.

parameter.name: output_name_first_page_number
parameter.documentation: Determines whether, for the first page of multipage output, the number is included in the filename.

parameter.name: output_name_first_page_number_value
parameter.documentation: Sets the number of the first page. All other pages are number from this value onwards.

parameter.name: output_fullname
parameter.documentation: Alternative way of specifying the output filename. Will be overwritten by output_name if defined.

parameter.name: output_legacy_name
parameter.documentation: Alternative way of specifying the output filename. Will be overwritten by output_name if defined.

parameter.name: output_file_minimal_width
parameter.documentation: Width of numbering of multi-file outputs (eg, 'plot.1.png' or 'plot.001.png').

parameter.name: output_file_separator
parameter.documentation: Defines the separator between root name and the page number. Default is a dot.

parameter.name: output_creator
parameter.documentation: Option for software using magics to put their name and version.

parameter.name: output_mgb_template
parameter.documentation: Path to the magics binary file to be used as a template

parameter.name: output_debug
parameter.documentation: Defines if extra debug information are written in the output file (PS, EPS, SVG) or console (PNG).

parameter.name: output_width
parameter.documentation: Defines the width of the image in pixels.(For GD and SVG)

parameter.name: output_filelist
parameter.documentation: Defines if a list of all generated files should be written.

parameter.name: output_filelist_name
parameter.documentation: Defines the name of the file containing the list of generated files.

parameter.name: output_filelist_reset
parameter.documentation: Defines if the file containing the list of generated files is started from scratch or appends to previous file.

parameter.name: output_frame_list
parameter.documentation: Defines the list of frames to plot ( if empty, all the frames will be plotted!).
